QuestData.Title: All In the Family
QuestData.Description: Conqueror's Terrace is watched over by two brothers; Spiritbinder Tu'chek and Arcanital Rak'ul. They are powerful magic users and should not be underestimated.$b$bTheir power seems to stem from the ornate masks they wear; relics passed down from one generation to the next. Each owner imbuing it with their own magic before passing it on.$b$bWe must deal with the brothers and destroy their masks before they fall into the wrong hands.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve the Mask of the Dark Mystic and the Mask of the Spirit-Caller from Spiritbinder Tu'chek and Arcanital Ra'kul within Conqueror's Terrace.
QuestData.RewardText: It's a shame really that these masks must be destroyed. I would have liked to study this ancient magic, but it is better that they be destroyed than become the tools of the Horde.$b$bGood work, $c.
